name: DJLand
description:
▼ Exquisite Art Style - More exquisite and comfortable than arcade graphics, perfect upgrade for gaming experience!

A brand new underwater world view, taking you to explore the deep-sea world and experience different core gameplay.

·Arcade fishing gameplay, fishing machine arcade fishing gameplay is more exciting.

·Created a variety of special effects fish, ready to catch at any time, and doubled the amount of gold coins as you please.

·The game interface is exquisite and gorgeous, with a variety of gameplay modes and styles, and various fish and sea monsters emerge endlessly.

·Various brand new visual effects, magnificent fish formations, and a unique visual experience for the game, allowing players to no longer have a single art style and witness more exciting effects.

You need to aim the gun at the fish and hit it, then you can receive rewards!
